}

<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
try{
	actyzm=result.match(/actyzm" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];
	button=result.match(/button" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];	
	url=java.get("url");
	code=String(url).replace(/\/sscc.*/,'')+"/member/getcode.asp";
	yzco=source.getVariable();
	function getOption(str,co){
  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/è¯·è¾“å…¥éªŒè¯ç /.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ï¼éªŒè¯ç è¿‡æœŸæˆ–æœ‰è¯¯ï¼Œé‡æ–°è·å–  ï¼")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>
.B

header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('ä»£ç†ï¼š').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "Referer": Get('url'),
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl)); var Option = { "method": "GET", "headers": Headers }; if(result.includes('no-js')){ cookie.removeCookie(Get('url')); java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"éªŒè¯").body()); } URL = baseUrl.replace(/reads\//, 'v2.0/apis/manga/read?code=').replace(/\/(\d+)/, '&cid=$1') + '&v=v2.13,{"headers":{"Referer":"' + baseUrl + '"},"method": "GET"}'; result = java.ajax(URL); if (!JSON.parse(result).data.scans) { java.webView('', baseUrl, ''); result = java.ajax(URL); } imglist=JSON.parse(result).data.scans; var result=''; var L = (chapter.index < book.totalChapterNum - 1) ? (imglist.length - 2) : imglist.length; for(i = 0; i < L; i++){ result +='\n' } } else { '
'; }

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('no-js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"éªŒè¯").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    if (baseUrl.includes("rank")) {
        var list = java.getElements('.manga-rank');
        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].select('.manga-title').text(),
                'author': String(list[i].select('.manga-category')[1].text()).replace(/[+Â·ï¼Œ\|\\]/g, '/').replace(/\/x\//g, '/').replace(/\,/g, '/').replace(/:\//g, ':').replace(/\/+/g, '/').replace(/ï¼ˆ/g, '(').replace(/ï¼‰/g, ')').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/\.\//g, '.'),
                'kind': String(list[i].select('.manga-category')[0].text()).replace(/\|/g, ',').replace(/\s/g, ',').replace(/ã€/g, ','),
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].select('.manga-rank-cover mip-img').attr('src') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),
                'url': list[i].select('a').attr('href')
            });
        }
        Data();
    } else {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data.items;
        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].last_chapter,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover.replace(/\\/g, '') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),
                'url': Get('url') + '/manga/' + list[i].manga_code
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/pn=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'pn=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',{"headers":{"Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/latest"},"method":"GET"}');
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.items[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

        if (String(ScriptTruncateElements[j]).includes('chapterList')) {
            var Script = String(ScriptTruncateElements[j]);
            var Json = JSON.parse(Script.replace(/.*json"\>/, '').replace(/\<\/.*/, ''));
            break;
        }
    }
    var list = Json.chapterList;
    date = 'ã€”' + java.getElements('.time').text() + 'ã€•';
    for (i = list.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        title = list[i].chapterName.replace(/^\ue66e/, '').replace(/^\s+/, '');
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ](|\s)ç¬¬.*?[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ]/, '$1').replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*ç¬¬.*(\d+).*?[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        title = String(title).replace(/(_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/(.*?[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ])\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/\s\s/g, ' ');
        code = baseUrl.replace(/.*manga\//, '');
        data.push({
            'title': i == 0 ? title + date : title,
            'link': Get('url') + '/reads/' + code + '/' + list[i].id
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

}(key));
